Submodules

src.environment.ros_social_gym module

class src.environment.ros_social_gym.AgentColor(r=- 1.0, g=- 1.0, b=- 1.0, reward=None)

Bases: object

class src.environment.ros_social_gym.RosSocialEnv(*args, launch_config: str = '/home/rosdev/social_gym/config/gym_gen/launch.launch', observer: Observer = None, rewarder: Rewarder = None, scenarios: List[src.environment.scenarios.scenario.Scenario] = (), num_humans: Union[int, Tuple[int, int]] = (5, 25), num_agents: Union[int, Tuple[int, int]] = (3, 5), debug: bool = False, visuals=None, **kwargs)

Bases: pettingzoo.ParallelEnv, gym.utils.EzPickle

A ros-based social navigation environment for OpenAI gym supporting MultiAgent training.

A lot of the documentation is taken from https://pettingzoo.farama.org/content/environment_creation/ which is almost entirely about supporting multiple agents in the environment.
